languages.text: {n}Глаза фактотума быстро скользят по инфопластине.{/n} "Думаю, мы можем в кратчайшие сроки отремонтировать "Бессердечного", затруднения вызовут только отсек для истребителей и некоторые части корпуса — на их починку потребуется больше времени. Главное, корабль сможет встать на службу династии без промедления".

{n}The Factotum's eyes dart over the data-slate in his hands.{/n} "I believe we can perform all the critically necessary repairs on the Heartless within the shortest time. Only the fighter launch bay and certain parts of the hull might pose some difficulties — it will take longer to fix those. Regardless, the vessel will be ready to serve the dynasty without delay."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза фактотума быстро скользят по инфопластине.{/n} "Думаю, мы можем в кратчайшие сроки отремонтировать "Бессердечного", затруднения вызовут только отсек для истребителей и некоторые части корпуса — на их починку потребуется больше времени. Главное, корабль сможет встать на службу династии без промедления".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Factotum's eyes dart over the data-slate in his hands.{/n} "I believe we can perform all the critical repairs on the Heartless within the shortest time. Only the fighter launch bay and certain parts of the hull might pose some difficulties — it will take longer to repair those. Regardless, the vessel will be ready to serve the dynasty without delay."
"Will do! Making the ship operational will take some time. I will let you know as soon as the Heartless is ready to serve the dynasty."

{n}The Factotum's eyes dart over the data-slate in his hands.{/n} "I believe we can perform all the critically necessary repairs on the Heartless within the shortest time. Only the fighter launch bay and certain parts of the hull might pose some difficulties — it will take longer to fix those. Regardless, the vessel will be ready to serve the dynasty without delay."

Only the fighter launch bay and certain parts of the hull might pose some difficulties — it will take longer to fix those. Regardless, the vessel will be ready to serve the dynasty without delay."

Only the fighter launch bay and certain parts of the hull might pose some difficulties — it will take longer to fix those. Regardless, the vessel will be ready to serve the dynasty without delay."

Only the fighter launch bay and certain parts of the hull might pose some difficulties — it will take longer to repair those. Regardless, the vessel will be ready to serve the dynasty without delay."

languages.text: {n}ファクトタムは手にしたデータスレートに素早く目を走らせた。{/n}「必要不可欠な修理はすべて、最短時間でハートレスに施せると思われます。戦闘機発進用の格納庫と船体の一部には若干の困難が予想されますが…修復にはやや時間がかかるでしょう。とはいえ、船は問題なく王朝のために稼働できる状態になるはずです」
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum's eyes dart over the data-slate in his hands.{/n} "I believe we can perform all the critically necessary repairs on the Heartless within the shortest time. Only the fighter launch bay and certain parts of the hull might pose some difficulties — it will take longer to fix those. Regardless, the vessel will be ready to serve the dynasty without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}ファクトタムは手にしたデータスレートに素早く目を走らせた。{/n}「必要不可欠な修理はすべて、最短時間でハートレスに施せると思われます。戦闘機発進用の格納庫と船体の一部には若干の困難が予想されますが…修復にはやや時間がかかるでしょう。とはいえ、船は問題なく王朝のために稼働できる状態になるはずです」
「承知しました！この船を稼働させるには少々時間がかかります。ハートレスが王朝に仕える準備が整い次第、すぐにご報告いたします」

languages.text: {n}Kâhya'nın gözleri, elindeki databela üzerinde geziniyor.{/n} "Taşkalp'deki en kritik öneme sahip onarımları en kısa sürede tamamlayabileceğimize inanıyorum. Savaş aracı kalkış bölmesi ve gövdenin belli kısımlarında zorluk yaşayabiliriz. Bunları onarmak zaman alacaktır. Her hâlükârda gemi, kısa süre içinde hanedanlığa hizmete hazır olacak."
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum's eyes dart over the data-slate in his hands.{/n} "I believe we can perform all the critically necessary repairs on the Heartless within the shortest time. Only the fighter launch bay and certain parts of the hull might pose some difficulties — it will take longer to fix those. Regardless, the vessel will be ready to serve the dynasty without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kâhya'nın gözleri, elindeki databela üzerinde geziniyor.{/n} "Taşkalp'deki en kritik öneme sahip onarımları en kısa sürede tamamlayabileceğimize inanıyorum. Savaş aracı kalkış bölmesi ve gövdenin belli kısımlarında zorluk yaşayabiliriz. Bunları onarmak zaman alacaktır. Her hâlükârda gemi, kısa süre içinde hanedanlığa hizmete hazır olacak."
"Nasıl isterseniz! Gemiyi çalışır hâle getirmek biraz zaman alacak. Taşkalp hanedana hizmet etmeye hazır olur olmaz sizi haberdar edeceğim."

languages.text: {n}El Factótum estudia la tablilla de datos que tiene en la mano.{/n} «Creo que podremos realizar todas las reparaciones esenciales para la Desalmada en poco tiempo. Las únicas dificultades posibles son la bahía de cazas y algunas secciones del casco, que llevarán más tiempo. Sin embargo, la nave podrá servir a la dinastía sin mayores retrasos».
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum's eyes dart over the data-slate in his hands.{/n} "I believe we can perform all the critically necessary repairs on the Heartless within the shortest time. Only the fighter launch bay and certain parts of the hull might pose some difficulties — it will take longer to fix those. Regardless, the vessel will be ready to serve the dynasty without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Factótum estudia la tablilla de datos que tiene en la mano.{/n} «Creo que podremos realizar todas las reparaciones esenciales para la Desalmada en poco tiempo. Las únicas dificultades posibles son la bahía de cazas y algunas secciones del casco, que llevarán más tiempo. Sin embargo, la nave podrá servir a la dinastía sin mayores retrasos».
«¡Así se hará! Tardaremos un tiempo en tener la nave operativa. L{mf|e|a} informaré en cuanto la Desalmada esté lista para servir a la dinastía».

languages.text: {n}高阶顾问的目光扫过了手中的数据版。{/n}“我相信，我们可以在最短时间内完成无心号必要的修复工作。不过，战斗机发射舱的结构与其他某些部分问题较多，修理这些部分恐怕要花上更多时间。但无论如何，等这艘船修好之后，它将会第一时间为王朝效力。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum's eyes dart over the data-slate in his hands.{/n} "I believe we can perform all the critically necessary repairs on the Heartless within the shortest time. Only the fighter launch bay and certain parts of the hull might pose some difficulties — it will take longer to fix those. Regardless, the vessel will be ready to serve the dynasty without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}高阶顾问的目光扫过了手中的数据版。{/n}“我相信，我们可以在最短时间内完成无心号必要的修复工作。不过，战斗机发射舱的结构与其他某些部分问题较多，修理这些部分恐怕要花上更多时间。但无论如何，等这艘船修好之后，它将会第一时间为王朝效力。”
“如您所愿！这艘船若要再次恢复运作，恐怕还需要些时间。等无心号做好为王朝服役的准备之后，我会第一时间通知您。”

languages.text: {n}Le factotum étudie la plaque de données qu'il a en main.{/n} « Je pense que nous serons en mesure d'effectuer très rapidement les réparations les plus critiques du Sans-Cœur. Nous ne devrions rencontrer de difficultés qu'avec certaines parties de la baie de lancement de chasseurs et de la coque, qui réclameront davantage de temps. Cependant, ce vaisseau sera très bientôt au service de la dynastie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum's eyes dart over the data-slate in his hands.{/n} "I believe we can perform all the critically necessary repairs on the Heartless within the shortest time. Only the fighter launch bay and certain parts of the hull might pose some difficulties — it will take longer to fix those. Regardless, the vessel will be ready to serve the dynasty without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le factotum étudie la plaque de données qu'il a en main.{/n} « Je pense que nous serons en mesure d'effectuer très rapidement les réparations les plus critiques du Sans-Cœur. Nous ne devrions rencontrer de difficultés qu'avec certaines parties de la baie de lancement de chasseurs et de la coque, qui réclameront davantage de temps. Cependant, ce vaisseau sera très bientôt au service de la dynastie. »
« C'est comme si c'était fait ! La réhabilitation de l'appareil va prendre un certain temps. Je vous préviendrai dès que le Sans-Cœur sera prêt à servir la dynastie. »

languages.text: {n}Die Augen des Faktotums huschen über den Datablock in seinen Händen.{/n} "Ich glaube, wir können alle zwingend erforderlichen Reparaturen an der Heartless in kürzester Zeit abschließen. Lediglich das Flugdeck der Jäger und bestimmte Teile des Rumpfs stellen uns vor einige Schwierigkeiten ... hier werden die Reparatur länger dauern. In jedem Fall wird das Schiff der Dynastie aber ohne Verzögerung zur Verfügung stehen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum's eyes dart over the data-slate in his hands.{/n} "I believe we can perform all the critically necessary repairs on the Heartless within the shortest time. Only the fighter launch bay and certain parts of the hull might pose some difficulties — it will take longer to fix those. Regardless, the vessel will be ready to serve the dynasty without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augen des Faktotums huschen über den Datablock in seinen Händen.{/n} "Ich glaube, wir können alle zwingend erforderlichen Reparaturen an der Heartless in kürzester Zeit abschließen. Lediglich das Flugdeck der Jäger und bestimmte Teile des Rumpfs stellen uns vor einige Schwierigkeiten ... hier werden die Reparatur länger dauern. In jedem Fall wird das Schiff der Dynastie aber ohne Verzögerung zur Verfügung stehen."
"Wird erledigt! Es wird eine Weile dauern, das Schiff flott zu machen. Ich werde Euch informieren, sobald die Heartless bereit ist, der Dynastie zu dienen."
